# Scroll To Top

## Tutorial
1. Oxygen → Templates → Add New Reusable Part  
2. Add title `Scroll To Top`  
3. Click on ``+Shortcodes`` and insert:
    ```
    [ct_fancy_icon ct_sign_sha256='123' ct_options='{"ct_id":1,"ct_parent":0,"selector":"fancy_icon-21-35","original":{"globalConditionsResult":true,"icon-id":"FontAwesomeicon-angle-up","custom-js":"","custom-css":""},"activeselector":"scroll-to-top","classes":{"0":"scroll-to-top"}}'][/ct_fancy_icon]
    ```
4. Save
5. Go to your Page, Add → Reusable → `Scroll To Top`
